snippet: Christopher Leggat began his search for a two-bedroom apartment in Manhattan with a budget of about $1 million.
abstract: The Hunt column on search by Christopher Leggat for a two-bedroom apartment in Manhattan with a budget of about $1 million; found an apartment for $1.65 million on Second Avenue and 23rd Street.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Leggat began his search for a two-bedroom apartment in Manhattan with a budget of about $1 million.

headline.print_headline: A Place More in Keeping With the Plan
headline.main: A Place More in Keeping With the Plan
